MaskerEar.description: Channel to be used for the masker noise. 0 = Left, 1 = Right, 2 = Both

MaskerPhase.description: Phase of the masking material delivered to the right channel (used only if MaskerEar = 2). If 0, deliver the exact same noise to both channels. If 180, invert it at the right ear.

LowCutoff.description: Low cutoff frequency to filter the masker noise.

HighCutoff.description: High cutoff frequency to filter the masker noise.

TargetEar.description: Channel to be used for the target. 0 = Left, 1 = Right, 2 = Both

TargetPhase.description: Phase of the target material delivered to the right channel (used only if TargetEar = 2). If 0, deliver the exact same noise to both channels. If 180, invert it at the right ear.
